title: Does Garen q still get a 50 units miny hop?
body: Didn't see it in the patch notes. I would hope so after the silence and speed duration nerfs, the one good change I like with his 50 units hop plus 175 attack range means he can q people from 225 range.

replies.body:
He does as I found out when I wanted to Q a guy that was closing in on me and then quickly run away and instead jumped into his face and died because of this...

Yeeah don't use the strike from Q if you want to disengage, the hop is really counterproductive when doing that

> [{quoted}](name=J Eevo,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OgnhUF2Q,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-20T22:32:19.934+0000)
>
> He does as I found out when I wanted to Q a guy that was closing in on me and then quickly run away and instead jumped into his face and died because of this...
> 
> Yeeah don't use the strike from Q if you want to disengage, the hop is really counterproductive when doing that

I also found out the hard way, can't q someone while retreating now but I still can go fast by spinning with the be equipped and don't get slowed.
